titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 75th anniversary of the establishment of the Veterans' Administration and acknowledging the achievements of the Veterans' Administration and the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/21/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the 75th anniversary of the establishment of the Veterans' Administration. Acknowledges the achievements of the employees of the Veterans' Administration and the Department of Veterans Affairs, and commends them for serving the veterans of the United States.
